content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/boto/boto3.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
FROM python:3.9

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Create a virtual environment
RUN python -m venv .venv
RUN . .venv/bin/activate

# Install development dependencies
RUN . .venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
RUN . .venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install -r requirements-dev.txt

# Run the test suite
RUN . .venv/bin/activate && pytest tests/unit
